channel.title: survey on Personal Website
channel.description: Recent content in survey on Personal Website

item.title: (in progress) Survey of water suppliers in Brazil
item.description: Purpose of the study The survey is part of a larger effort to collect original data in preparation of the publication “Development in America” 2020 that will focus on Infrastructure (Energy, Water and Transportation) sector in LAC. Creators This page was created by Luisa M. Mimmi (Research Fellow - consultant at IADB) but builds on data collected by various IADB colleagues and partner organizations. Acknowledgements This survey is sponsored by the Interamerican Development Bank (IADB), Water Division, Knowledge Team WSA Knowledge, where I work as a consultant.
